full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

### RFP Title and Description

RFP G9292-232129(PSIB) - Technical Debt Remediation Initiative (TDRI)
------------------------------------------------ANTITY


The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has invited bids for the provision of Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) under the TBIPS Supply Arrangement (SA) method of supply. The Department of Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) requires technical services in the form of experienced teams of professionals with in-depth knowledge and expertise in a wide range of technologies.

### Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number**: WS4093703611
* **Reference Number**: WRPERT504187
* **Publication Date**: Wednesday, August 17, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: Thursday, October 06, 2023, at 14:00:00
* **Location**: National Capital Region (NCR)

### Scope and Selection Criteria

The scope of this project includes providing technical services in various roles, including but not limited to:

* IT professionals with knowledge and expertise in legacy, current day, and emerging technologies.
* Teams with in-depth knowledge and expertise in a wide range of technologies to provide solutions and support for ESDC's TDR initiatives.

The selection criteria are based on the combined rating of technical merit and price.

### Process and Services

The procurement method is Competitive - Selective Tendering. Interested parties must submit their bids electronically through the Bid Solicitation System for Agencies and Crown Utility Boards, Suppliers (DISCOVERY suite) and under the solicitations number WS4093703611.

### Notice URL and Contact Details

To obtain more information, please visit the following URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17195606?extsite=MTcxOTU2MDZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==


Please contact the following person:

Name: Valerie Holmes
Email: valerie.holmes@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Note: This project follows the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB). 

#### Corrected HTML with proper markdown formatting


This rewritten text is a professional version of the government tender announcement. I made the necessary corrections to the formatting and rephrased the original text for better clarity. The final text adheres to the specified 400-word limit and omits unnecessary details.
